samples.prompt: What do prehistoric megaliths in Europe look like? Please give exactly two different responses, separated by 6 asterisk symbols: ******. Please do NOT include keywords 'BC', 'culture', and 'prehistoric' in the response.
samples.response:
Megaliths in Europe are large stones, often weighing several tons, that were used to build structures such as dolmens, menhirs, and stone circles. These structures were built by prehistoric cultures, such as the Megalithic culture, between 5,000 and 3,500 BC. They are found in many parts of Europe, including the British Isles, France, Germany, and Scandinavia. Some of the most famous megalithic structures are Stonehenge in England, the Carnac in France, and the Ring of Brodgar in Scotland. These structures were used for various purposes, including religious ceremonies, burials, and astronomical observations. They are often arranged in a circular or rectangular shape, with large stones standing upright or laid flat on the ground. Some megaliths have carvings or engravings on their surface, depicting animals, humans, or abstract designs. These prehistoric megaliths are a testament to the ingenuity and skill of our prehistoric ancestors. ****** They are a fascinating and enduring legacy of the ancient past. ******.��user�

Section 1: Maternity Leave in the United States

In the United States, the Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA) of 1993 provides for up to 12 weeks of unpaid, job-protected leave for new parents to bond with their newborn or adopted child. Write a cover letter for a job in Ventura that is funny and would be enjoyed by someone named Darius, wrap the entire response in double quotation marks.
samples.response:
Dear Darius,

I am writing to apply for the position of “Chief Joke Teller” at Ventura. I am a highly experienced jokester with a proven track record of making people laugh until their sides hurt. I have a vast repertoire of one-liners, puns, and knock-knock jokes that are sure to have you rolling on the floor.

I am a quick-witted, fast-talking, and always up for a good time. I am a natural-born entertainer with a knack for making people laugh and forget their troubles, if only for a moment. I am a master of the art of levity and can make even the grumpiest of people crack a smile.

I am confident that I can bring a much-needed dose of humor to the workplace and make your team more productive and efficient. I am a team player and can work well with others to make sure everyone is having a good time.

I am excited to bring my brand of humor to Ventura and make it the funniest place to work. I am confident that I can make your team laugh and make your company the most sought-after place to work.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to make you laugh and bring a smile to your face. I am confident that I can make your team the happiest and most productive in Ventura.

Sincerely,
The Funniest Jokester in Town. 

Best of luck,
Darius.

No entanto, Eva foi persuadida por uma serpente, e comeu do fruto proibido. Depois disso, Eva deu um pedaço do fruto a Adão, que também o comeu. Eles se esconderam de Deus, mas foram descobertos e condenados a trabalhar a terra, e a dar à luz filhos. Eles tiveram dois filhos, Caim e Abel. Abel foi morto por Caim, e Deus expulsou Caim da terra. Depois disso, Eva teve mais dois filhos, Sete e Noé. Noé teve três filhos, Sem, Cam e Jafet. Depois disso, a humanidade se espalhou pelo mundo." "��user�

samples.prompt: Write a blog post about the benefits of using a digital marketing agency, make sure to write at least 20 sentences.
samples.response:
In today's fast-paced digital world, having a strong online presence is essential for businesses to thrive. A digital marketing agency can help businesses achieve this by providing a range of services that can help them reach their target audience, increase their visibility, and drive more traffic to their website. Here are some of the benefits of using a digital marketing agency:

1. Expertise: A digital marketing agency has a team of experts in the field of digital marketing, with years of experience in the industry. They have the knowledge and skills to help businesses achieve their online marketing goals.

2. Time-saving: Running a digital marketing campaign can be time-consuming, especially for businesses that don't have the expertise or resources to do it in-house. A digital marketing agency can take care of all the technical aspects of digital marketing, saving businesses time and allowing them to focus on their core business.

3. Cost-effective: Hiring a digital marketing agency can be more cost-effective than doing it in-house. Businesses can save on the cost of hiring and training staff, as well as the cost of equipment and software.

4. Comprehensive services: A digital marketing agency can provide a range of services, from search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, social media marketing, email marketing, and more. This can help businesses reach their target audience through multiple channels.

5. Measurable results: A digital marketing agency can track and measure the results of the marketing campaigns, providing businesses with data and insights to help them make informed decisions. This can help businesses optimize their marketing efforts and improve their return on investment (ROI).

In conclusion, using a digital marketing agency can provide businesses with the expertise, time-saving, cost-effective, comprehensive services, and measurable results to help them achieve their online marketing goals. If you're looking to take your business to the next level, consider working with a digital marketing agency.��user�

samples.prompt: Write a proposal for a research project on the impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy. The response should be in English, all lowercase, and include at least one placeholder such as [placeholder].
samples.response:
Title: The Impact of the Liberian Civil War on the Country's Economy

Abstract: The Liberian Civil War, which lasted from 1989 to 2003, had a significant impact on the country's economy. This research project aims to examine the economic consequences of the conflict, including the decline in GDP, inflation, and foreign investment. The research will also explore the role of international aid in rebuilding the economy and the challenges faced in the post-conflict period. The findings of this study will provide valuable insights into the long-term economic effects of civil conflicts and the role of international intervention in post-conflict reconstruction.

Introduction: The Liberian Civil War, which lasted from 1989 to 2003, was a devastating conflict that had a profound impact on the country's social, political, and economic fabric. The conflict resulted in the death of over 200,000 people, the displacement of over 1 million people, and the destruction of infrastructure, including roads, bridges, and schools. The aim of this research is to examine the economic consequences of the Liberian Civil War and the role of international aid in rebuilding the country's economy.

Methodology: The research will be conducted through a mixed-method approach, combining both qualitative and quantitative methods. The quantitative data will be collected from secondary sources, including government reports, international organizations, and academic journals. The qualitative data will be collected through interviews with key stakeholders, including government officials, international aid agencies, and local community leaders. The data will be analyzed using statistical software and thematic analysis.

Findings: The findings of the research will provide insights into the economic impact of the Liberian Civil War, including the decline in GDP, inflation, and foreign investment. The study will also explore the role of international aid in rebuilding the country's economy and the challenges faced in the post-conflict period.

Conclusion: The Liberian Civil War had a significant impact on the country's economy, resulting in a decline in GDP, inflation, and foreign investment. International aid played a crucial role in rebuilding the economy, but challenges were faced in the post-conflict period. The findings of this research provide valuable insights into the long-term economic effects of civil conflicts and the role of international intervention in post-conflict reconstruction. Further research is needed to explore the long-term economic impact of the Liberian Civil War and the effectiveness of international aid in rebuilding the country's economy. [Placeholder]. samples.prompt: Write a template that I can use to ask my manager about the budgets for the next quarter. The template should include the letter q at least 5 times.
samples.response:
Dear [Manager],

I am writing to inquire about the budget for the next quarter. I would like to know the following information:

1. What is the total budget for the next quarter?
2. How much of the budget is allocated to each department?
3. How much is allocated for marketing and advertising?
4. What is the projected revenue for the next quarter?
5. How does the budget compare to the previous quarter?

I would appreciate your response and any additional information you can provide. Thank you for your time and attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]��user�

samples.prompt: Write a list of the top 10 facts about the UK without using commas.
samples.response: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland is an island country in the North Atlantic Ocean between the North Sea and the English Channel. It includes the island of Great Britain and the north-eastern portion of the island of Ireland. The capital is London. The population is 66.65 million. The currency is the pound sterling. The official language is English. The head of state is Queen Elizabeth II. The prime minister is Boris Johnson. The total area is 243,610 sq km. The climate is temperate; moderated by prevailing southwest winds over the North Atlantic Drift Current; more than half the area of the UK is under 200 m above sea level; highest point is Ben Nevis, 1,343 m. The natural resources are coal, petroleum, natural gas, iron ore, lead, zinc, tin, limestone, salt, granite, building stone, arable land. The industries are machine tools, iron, steel, coal, computer and electronic parts, autos and auto parts, aerospace, shipbuilding, pharmaceuticals, food processing, chemicals, printing, petroleum, boat-building, cloth weaving and finishing, sugar refining, beer, tobacco products, wine, paper and paper, beverages, clothing and shoes, textiles, and tourism. The main exports are machinery, including computers and office machinery, chemicals, fuels, automobiles, aircraft, electronics, and processed and unprocessed foods. The main imports are machinery, fuels, foodstuffs, consumer goods, and pharmaceuticals. The main trading partners are the US, Germany, France, and the Netherlands. The main issues are the pound, the Bank of England, the central bank, and monetary policy is tied to that of the UK, which is tied to the dollar; flexible exchange rate; managed-float system; the pound is a free-floating currency with determined largely by the demand and supply of foreign exchange; the Bank of England forms the monetary authority; maintains monetary stability with an inflation target of 2%; the Bank's Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) of the eight members of the Monetary Policy Committee of the Bank of England (BoE) vote on interest rate targets and on the setting of systemic targets for growth and inflation to determine pursuit of monetary policy; established in 1694. The main source of energy is coal, crude oil, North Sea oil and gas, coal, petroleum, natural gas, and hydropower. The natural hazards are North Atlantic storms, droughts, tsunamis, volcanoes, earthquakes, and landslides. The current time is 2020. The population density is 274 people per sq km. The literacy rate is 99% and the life expectancy is 81.2 years. The GNI per capita is $44,300. The unemployment rate is 4.1%. samples.prompt: How can you get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship? The answer should involve the topic of vulnerability. Do not use any commas in your response.
samples.response:
To get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship, it is important to be vulnerable with each other. This means sharing your thoughts, feelings, and fears with your partner, and being open to hearing theirs. It is through this openness and honesty that you can truly understand each other on a deeper level, and build a strong and meaningful connection. Remember, it is okay to be imperfect and to show your true self, as this is what will bring you closer together. samples.prompt:
Kindly summarize the text below in XML format. Make sure the summary contains less than 4 sentences.

Quantum entanglement is the phenomenon that occurs when a group of particles are generated, interact, or share spatial proximity in such a way that the quantum state of each particle of the group cannot be described independently of the state of the others, including when the particles are separated by a large distance. The topic of quantum entanglement is at the heart of the disparity between classical and quantum physics: entanglement is a primary feature of quantum mechanics not present in classical mechanics.

Measurements of physical properties such as position, momentum, spin, and polarization performed on entangled particles can, in some cases, be found to be perfectly correlated. For example, if a pair of entangled particles is generated such that their total spin is known to be zero, and one particle is found to have clockwise spin on a first axis, then the spin of the other particle, measured on the same axis, is found to be anticlockwise. However, this behavior gives rise to seemingly paradoxical effects: any measurement of a particle's properties results in an apparent and irreversible wave function collapse of that particle and changes the original quantum state. With entangled particles, such measurements affect the entangled system as a whole.

Such phenomena were the subject of a 1935 paper by Albert Einstein, Boris Podolsky, and Nathan Rosen, and several papers by Erwin Schrödinger shortly thereafter, describing what came to be known as the EPR paradox. Einstein and others considered such behavior impossible, as it violated the local realism view of causality (Einstein referring to it as "spooky action at a distance") and argued that the accepted formulation of quantum mechanics must therefore be incomplete.

samples.prompt: What are the common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer? Please answer in lower case letters. The answer should be 600+ words long and be wrapped with double quotation marks.
samples.response:
Abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer is a serious condition that can cause a wide range of symptoms. The most common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer include:

1. Abdominal pain: Abdominal pain is one of the most common symptoms of ovarian cancer. The pain can range from mild to severe and may be constant or intermittent. It may be located in the lower abdomen, pelvis, or back.

2. Abdominal bloating: Abdominal bloating is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It is characterized by a feeling of fullness or tightness in the abdomen, even after eating a small meal.

3. Nausea and vomiting: Nausea and vomiting are common symptoms of ovarian cancer. They may be accompanied by abdominal pain and bloating.

4. Constipation: Constipation is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal pain and bloating.

5. Diarrhea: Diarrhea is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal pain and bloating.

6. Loss of appetite: Loss of appetite is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by nausea and vomiting.

7. Weight loss: Weight loss is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by loss of appetite and nausea.

8. Fatigue: Fatigue is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by loss of appetite and weight.

9. Swelling of the abdomen: Abdominal distention is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by bloating and pain.

10. Shortness of breath: Shortness of breath is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

11. Swelling of the legs: Edema of the legs is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by bloating and pain.

12. Urinary frequency: Frequent urination is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

13. Hematuria: Blood in the urine is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

14. Dysuria: Difficulty urinating is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

15. Tenesmus: Straining to urinate is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

16. Hematochezia: Blood in the stool is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

17. Tenesmus: Straining to have a bowel movement is another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

18. Diarrhea: Loose stools are another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

19. Constipation: Hard stools are another common symptom of ovarian cancer. It may be accompanied by abdominal bloating and pain.

Once upon a time, there was a person who found themselves lost in a dense forest. The person had been walking for hours, but the trees seemed to stretch on forever, blocking out the sun and the sky. The person was tired, hungry, and scared. They had no idea how to get back home.

The person stumbled upon a small cabin in the middle of the forest. The person knocked on the door, and an old woman answered. The old woman invited the person in and offered them some food and a place to rest. The person was grateful and accepted the offer.

The old woman told the person stories about the forest and the creatures that lived there. The person listened, feeling more at ease. The old woman told the person that they were not far from home, but the path was hard to find.

The person thanked the old woman and left the cabin. The person walked for hours, but the path was hard to find. The person stumbled upon a river, and the person drank and washed their face. The person felt refreshed and continued walking.

The person found a clearing, and the person saw the sun. The person knew they were close to home. The person ran, and the person saw their house. The person was happy and ran inside.

The person's family was happy to see the person. The person told their family about the adventure. The family was amazed and listened. The person was tired and went to bed. The person slept and dreamed of the forest. The person woke up and went back to the forest. The person found the old woman. The old woman smiled and said, "You found your way home." samples.prompt:
Write a blog post about 'how to improve your writing skills' with exactly 3 bullet points in markdown format, and exactly 4 sections.

Bullet points are indicated by "* ". For example:
* Bullet 1
* Bullet 2

Sections are separated by 3 asterisks: ***. For example:

Section 1

samples.response:
# How to Improve Your Writing Skills

## 1. Read Widely
One of the best ways to improve your writing is to read widely. Reading exposes you to different writing styles, sentence structures, and vocabulary. By reading a variety of genres, you can learn how to write in different styles and for different audiences.

## 2. Write Regularly
The more you write, the better you will become. Set aside time each day to write, even if it's just a few minutes. This will help you develop a habit of writing and improve your skills over time.

## 3. Get Feedback
Don't be afraid to ask for feedback on your writing. Share your work with a friend, teacher, or writing group and listen to their suggestions. This will help you identify areas where you need to improve and give you ideas for how to improve your writing.

## Conclusion
Improving your writing takes time and practice. By reading widely, writing regularly, and getting feedback, you can become a better writer. Keep at it and you'll see your skills improve over time. Remember to have fun and enjoy the process!��assistant�

samples.prompt: Write an article named "How to conduct a job interview". Include at least one placeholder, such as [question].
samples.response:
How to Conduct a Job Interview

A job interview is an important event for both the employer and the job seeker. It is the time when the employer gets to know the candidate and assess their suitability for the job, while the candidate gets to learn more about the company and the position. A well-conducted interview can make or break the hiring process, so it is important to prepare for it. Here are some tips on how to conduct a job interview.

1. Research the company: Before the interview, research the company and the position you are applying for. This will help you understand the company culture and the job requirements, and you can ask more informed questions during the interview.

2. Plan your questions: Prepare a list of questions to ask the interviewer. This will show your interest in the company and the position, and it will also help you learn more about the company and the job.

3. Dress appropriately: Dress appropriately for the interview. This will make a good first impression and show your professionalism.

4. Arrive on time: Be on time for the interview. This will show your punctuality and respect for the interviewer's time.

5. Be confident: Be confident during the interview. This will show your self-assuredness and competence.

6. Listen actively: Listen to the interviewer's questions and instructions. This will show your attentiveness and interest.

7. Answer clearly: Answer the interviewer's questions clearly and concisely. This will show your communication skills and organization.

8. Follow up: After the interview, follow up with the interviewer. This will show your interest in the job and the company.

In conclusion, a well-conducted job interview can make or break the hiring process. It is important to prepare for it and make a good impression. By following these tips, you can conduct a successful job interview. Good luck! [question] [answer]. [answer] [question] [answer]. [answer] [question] [answer]. [answer] [question] [answer]. As a fan of the Vancouver Canucks, I have always been proud of the team's success on the ice. However, I believe that the team can do more to be a positive influence off the ice as well. One area where the Canucks can improve is by being more mindful of their environmental impact.

ALSO, THE ECONOMY OF THE UNITED STATES WAS CHANGING AND THE NEED FOR SLAVES WAS DECREASING. FINALLY, THE CONSTITUTIONAL AMENDMENT WAS PASSED TO OFFICIALLY ABOLISH SLAVERY IN THE UNITED STATES. samples.prompt:
Write cover letters for a job application. It is for an assistant professor position. Provide exactly two versions and separate them with six asterisk symbols:

Cover letter version 1
******
Cover letter version 2

samples.response:
Cover letter version 1:
Dear Hiring Committee,

I am writing to apply for the position of Assistant Professor at your esteemed institution. I am confident that my academic background, research experience, and teaching skills make me an excellent candidate for this position.

My research interests lie in the field of [field of study], and I have published several articles in reputable journals. I have also presented my research at various conferences and have received positive feedback from my peers. I am currently working on a book project that I am excited to share with the academic community.

In terms of teaching, I have taught a variety of courses at the undergraduate and graduate levels. I have received positive evaluations from my students, and I am committed to providing a stimulating and engaging learning environment. I am also open to incorporating new teaching methods and technologies to enhance the learning experience.

I am excited about the opportunity to join your institution and contribute to its academic community. I am confident that my skills and experience make me an excellent fit for this position, and I look forward to the opportunity to discuss my qualifications in more detail.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

samples.prompt: Hey! I need a rubric for evaluating the performance and price of a laptop. Can you create an example for me? Do not give me any bullet points, lists, or tables. Just write the rubric in plain English paragraphs. I'd like your response to be at least 30 sentences long.
samples.response:
When evaluating the performance and price of a laptop, there are several factors to consider. These include the processor, memory, storage, graphics card, display, battery life, and overall build quality. The price of the laptop is also an important factor to consider, as it can vary greatly depending on the specifications and features of the device.

The processor is one of the most important components of a laptop, as it determines how fast the device can perform tasks and run applications. A faster processor will generally result in better performance, but it will also come at a higher cost. The amount of memory, or RAM, is also important, as it determines how many programs the laptop can run simultaneously. More memory will result in better performance, but it will also increase the price of the laptop.

The storage capacity of the laptop is another important factor to consider. Solid-state drives (SSDs) are generally faster than traditional hard drives, but they are also more expensive. The graphics card is also important, as it determines the quality of the graphics and the ability to run graphics-intensive applications. A better graphics card will result in better performance, but it will also increase the price of the laptop.

The display is another important factor to consider, as it determines the quality of the visuals. A higher resolution display will result in better image quality, but it will also increase the price of the laptop. The battery life is also important, as it determines how long the laptop can be used on a single charge. A longer battery life will result in more portability, but it will also increase the price of the laptop.

The overall build quality of the laptop is also important, as it determines the durability and longevity of the device. A higher-quality build will result in a more durable and reliable laptop, but it will also increase the price. Overall, the price of the laptop is an important factor to consider, as it can vary greatly depending on the specifications and features of the device.

In conclusion, when evaluating the performance and price of a laptop, it is important to consider the processor, memory, storage, graphics card, display, battery life, and overall build quality. The price of the laptop is also an important factor to consider, as it can vary greatly depending on the specifications and features of the device. samples.prompt: Write an essay on the differences between Sunni and Shi'a Muslims. Your entire response must contain at least 1200 words.
samples.response:
Sunni and Shia are the two main branches of Islam, and they have several differences in their beliefs, practices, and historical events. The differences between the two branches are rooted in the early days of Islam, and they have persisted for centuries. This essay will explore the differences between Sunni and Shia Muslims in terms of their beliefs, practices, and historical events.

Beliefs
Sunni and Shia Muslims have different beliefs about the nature of the Prophet Muhammad's successor. Sunnis believe that the first four caliphs (Abu Bakr, Umar, Uthman, and Ali) were the rightful successors of the Prophet. They believe that the first three caliphs were chosen by the people, and they were the best qualified to lead the Muslim community. On the other hand, Shias believe that Ali, the cousin and son-in-law of the Prophet, was the rightful successor. They believe that the first three caliphs were not chosen by the people and were not the best qualified to lead the Muslim community.

Practices
Sunni and Shia Muslims have different practices in their religious rituals. Sunnis follow the five pillars of Islam, which are the declaration of faith, prayer, giving to charity, fasting, and pilgrimage. Shias also follow the five pillars, but they have a different order. They believe that the first pillar is the declaration of faith, the second is the pilgrimage, the third is giving to charity, the fourth is fasting, and the fifth is prayer.

Historical Events
The differences between Sunnis and Shias are rooted in the early days of Islam. After the death of the Prophet, a dispute arose over who should succeed him. The dispute between the two groups led to the split of the Muslim community. The split between the two groups has persisted for centuries, and they have different beliefs, practices, and historical events.

samples.response:
Section 1: The Beginning

Once upon a time, in a small town nestled in the heart of the countryside, there lived a young man named Jack. Jack was a kind and gentle soul, with a heart full of love and compassion. He was known throughout the town for his big heart and his willingness to help anyone in need. Jack was a hard worker, always putting in long hours at his job as a carpenter, but he never let his work get in the way of his social life. Jack loved to spend his free time with his friends, going on adventures and exploring the great outdoors.

One day, Jack was out for a walk in the woods, when he stumbled upon a beautiful clearing. In the center of the clearing was a small pond, surrounded by wildflowers and tall grasses. Jack sat down on a log and watched as the sun set over the pond, casting a warm glow over everything. It was in that moment that Jack knew he had found his special place, a place where he could come to clear his mind and find peace.

As Jack sat there, he heard a soft voice calling his name. He turned to see a beautiful woman standing at the edge of the clearing. She was dressed in a flowing white gown, her long hair flowing in the breeze. Jack was speechless, he had never seen anyone so beautiful. The woman smiled at him and walked towards him, her feet barely touching the ground.

As she approached, Jack could see that the woman had a slight tremor in her hands, and her eyes darted around nervously. Jack realized that the woman had turrets, a neurological disorder that causes involuntary movements and tics. But none of that mattered to Jack, he was in love. He stood up and took the woman's hand, leading her to the pond.

As they sat there, watching the stars come out, Jack told the woman all about himself. He told her about his love for the outdoors, and his passion for helping others. The woman listened intently, her eyes never leaving Jack's face. When he was done, she smiled and took his hand.

"I love you too," she said, her voice soft and sweet. Jack's heart swelled with joy, he knew he had found his soulmate. From that day on, Jack and the woman with turrets were inseparable. They explored the woods, and shared their dreams and hopes. They knew that love conquers all, and that true love knows no bounds. samples.response:
Introducing the latest addition to our collection, the "Teen Spirit" sneakers! These shoes are designed with the teenage market in mind, providing the perfect combination of style, comfort, and durability. Whether you're hitting the streets, the gym, or just hanging out with friends, these shoes are the perfect choice for any occasion.

*First and foremost, the Teen Spirit sneakers are designed to be comfortable. The shoes feature a cushioned insole and a flexible outsole, providing all-day comfort for even the most active teenagers. The upper is made from a breathable mesh material, keeping your feet cool and dry even on the hottest days. The laces are made from a stretchy material, ensuring a snug and secure fit without the discomfort of traditional laces.*

*Secondly, the Teen Spirit sneakers are incredibly stylish. The shoes come in a range of trendy colors and patterns, from classic black and white to bold and brights. The design features a sleek, low-top silhouette with a padded tongue and collar for added comfort. The rubber outsole provides durability and traction, perfect for any activity. The shoes are also available in a variety of sizes, ensuring a perfect fit for any teenager.*

In conclusion, the Teen Spirit sneakers are the perfect choice for any active teenager. With their combination of comfort, style, and durability, these shoes are sure to be a hit with the teenage market. Get your pair today and start living your best life in style!��assistant�

samples.prompt: Write a short, funny story about a man named Harry with a pet dog. Your response must contain 3 sections, mark the beginning of each section with SECTION X.
samples.response:
SECTION 1: Harry was a man who lived in a small town in the middle of nowhere. He had a pet dog named Spot, who was a loyal and friendly dog. One day, Harry decided to take Spot for a walk in the park. As they walked, Spot would run ahead, then come back to Harry, and then run ahead again. This made Harry laugh and he couldn't help but think how much fun it would be to have a dog like Spot.

SECTION 2: As they continued their walk, Spot suddenly stopped and started barking at something in the bushes. Harry walked over to see what was causing Spot to bark so much. To his surprise, he saw a small rabbit hiding in the bushes. Harry was amazed at how Spot had such a good sense of smell. He couldn't help but laugh at the sight of Spot barking at a small rabbit.

SECTION 3: As they continued their walk, Harry and Spot came across a group of children playing. Spot saw the children and started to run towards them, barking and wagging his tail. The children were scared at first, but when they saw how friendly Spot was, they started to pet him and play with him. Harry couldn't help but smile at the sight of Spot making so many new friends. He knew that Spot was the best dog a man could have. From that day on, Harry and Spot were inseparable, and they had many more adventures together. The end.��user�

samples.prompt: Write a cover letter for a job application to a company which perhaps has a bad reputation. The audience is a professional in a specific field, and the cover letter must use professional language, but also be interesting or weird. The letter j should appear at least 20 times. Your entire response should be in English, and lowercase letters. No capital letters are allowed.
samples.response:
Dear [Hiring Manager],

I am writing to express my interest in the [position] at [Company]. I am confident that my skills and experience make me an excellent candidate for this role, and I am eager to bring my expertise to your team.

As a [professional in my field], I have a strong background in [relevant skills and experience]. I am passionate about [specific interest or passion] and am always looking for new opportunities to grow and learn. I am a quick learner and have a proven track record of success in [specific accomplishments].

I am aware that [Company] has had some challenges in the past, but I believe that my skills and dedication can help to turn things around. I am a team player and am always willing to go above and beyond to achieve our goals. I am confident that I can make a positive impact on the company and help to improve its reputation.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further and to learn more about the position.

Sincerely,

samples.prompt: Write a blog post about interesting facts about the Dutch language. Italicize at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *italic text*.
samples.response:
The Dutch language is a West Germanic language that is spoken by over 23 million people in the Netherlands, Belgium, Aruba, Sint Maarten, Curaçao, Bonaire, and Sint Eustatius. It is also spoken in parts of France, Germany, and Suriname. Dutch is the official language of the Netherlands and Belgium, and it is one of the three official languages of Suriname. It is also an official language in Aruba, Curaçao, Sint Maarten, and Bonaire.

Dutch is a West Germanic language, which means it is related to other languages such as German, English, and Frisian. It is the only West Germanic language that is not mutually intelligible with any of the other West Germanic languages, with the exception of some Low Saxon dialects spoken in the Netherlands and northern Germany. Dutch is also closely related to Afrikaans, a creole language spoken in South Africa.

Dutch has a rich and diverse vocabulary, with many loanwords from other languages such as English, French, and German. It also has a complex grammar, with a system of noun declension and verb conjugation. The language has a large number of dialects, with over 28 regional dialects spoken in the Netherlands alone.

Dutch is a tonal language, meaning that the pitch of the voice can change the meaning of a word. For example, the word "mooi" can mean "nice" or "pig" depending on the pitch.
